titles.title: Medicare Safe Needle Disposal Coverage Act of 2005

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage, as supplies associated with the injection of insulin, of home needle destruction devices and the disposal of needles and lancets through a sharps-by-mail or similar program under part D of the Medicare program.
Medicare Safe Needle Disposal Coverage Act of 2005

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Medicare Safe Needle Disposal Coverage Act of 2005 (sic) - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage (as supplies associated with the injection of insulin) of home needle destruction devices and disposal of needles and lancets through a sharps-by-mail or similar program under Medicare part D (Voluntary Prescription Drug Benefit Program).
